question: Boston Bruins win the 2024 Stanley Cup?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Boston Bruins become the 2024 Stanley Cup Champion. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If it is determined at any point that it is impossible for the Bruins to be the 2024 Stanley Cup Champion based on the rules of the NHL (e.g. they're eliminated in the playoffs), this market will immediately resolve to "No."

If this team is still in contention to become the champion and the champion still isn't determined by November 3, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Timberwolves vs. Suns
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for April 20:
     
If the Minnesota Timberwolves win, the market will resolve to "Timberwolves.

If the Phoenix Suns win, the market will resolve to Suns.

If the game is not completed by April 26, 2024 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Israel aid package by April 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a new bill containing at least $1 billion in aid to Israel is signed into law in the US between April 14 and April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Funding for replenishment of US stocks sent to Israel counts as Israel aid. Aid in the form of a loan will count toward this market's resolution.

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the US federal government, however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: $DJT market cap less than $1b on April 30?
description:
This market will resolve to Yes if the market cap of Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. (DJT) is less than $1 billion as of market close on April 30, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to No.

The market capitalization of Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. will be determined by checking Google Finances Market Cap metric for DJT at the time of market close for April 30, 2024 (website: https://www.google.com/finance/quote/DJT:NASDAQ).

If Google Finances market cap data for DJT is not available by April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible source for market capitalization on April 30, market close, will be used to resolve this market.
